briefTitle: An Investigational Immuno-therapy Study of BMS-986205 Combined With Nivolumab, Compared to Nivolumab by Itself, in Patients With Advanced Melanoma
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Double-blind Study of BMS-986205 Combined With Nivolumab Versus Nivolumab in Participants With Metastatic or Unresectable Melanoma That is Previously Untreated
summary: The purpose of this study is to see if BMS-986205 combined with nivolumab, compared to nivolumab by itself, is more effective in treating Melanoma that has spread or is unable to be removed by surgery, and has not previously been treated

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants Experiencing Adverse Events
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From first dose to 30 days following last dose (up to approximately 25 months)
